title: Don't give up Summoners!
body:
After long hours of refreshing, I finally got my copy of the Mechs VS Minions.

_[EDIT - Bioluminescence has removed your link to the image.  Probably safest if you blank out your order number as well as your name!  Better safe than sorry.]_

My advise is to checkout as a guest to avoid getting stuck again.

Good luck!

replies.body:
Hey EPIKON!

I edited your post to remove your screenshot.  Sorry!  But it might not be the safest thing to have your order number out there.  It's not horribly dangerous, but someone with it and a few other pieces of information could combine them to get sekrits off you.

You can totally edit your image and post it up again with it blanked out though!
(Also - hype!  I know the store has been melting all day.  I'm not anywhere near that team, but I know they're trying really hard to make it work for everyone.)

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=AMxvhsRt,discussion-id=tQR8IaeX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-13T22:58:04.880+0000)
>
> Hey EPIKON!
> 
> I edited your post to remove your screenshot.  Sorry!  But it might not be the safest thing to have your order number out there.  It's not horribly dangerous, but someone with it and a few other pieces of information could combine them to get sekrits off you.
> 
> You can totally edit your image and post it up again with it blanked out though!
> (Also - hype!  I know the store has been melting all day.  I'm not anywhere near that team, but I know they're trying really hard to make it work for everyone.)

Thank you.
